data.meta_description: Apr 19, 2018 - Ran on ABC from 1976-1988. ABC, CBS and NBC  8 1/2 years.  Represented by stars from their shows, one from each team was elected as the team captain. One last competition aired in Dec 1988. Sports broadcaster Howard Cosell hosted or co-hosted all but one of the first 19 shows (he didn't host the 1985 one due to a falling-out with ABC, he returned for the last one in 1988), and commented on the action with a semi-serious version for which he was noted. See more ideas about battle, nbc, cbs.
